subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox pounded the World Series star Jeff Weaver for seven runs in the first two innings yesterday, celebrating their home opener with a 14-3 victory against Seattle. It was the Mariners’ first game since a blizzard snowed out their four-game series in Cleveland.
